DOCU_Docu.DOC:
Actions to access LDAP.
=Supported versions=
See http://docs.automic.com/compatibility?len=Package.LDAP&comp=PCK.AUTOMIC_LDAP&version=1.0.1
=Rollback=
The actions getting some system information don't need rollbacks, because they do not change the state of your system. Such methods are AUTHENTICATE_USER, CHECK_ATTRIBUTE, SEARCH.
Actions potentially changing the state of your system (e.g MODIFY, MODIFY_ATTRIBUTE, MODIFY_DN, DELETE and ADD) do not have rollbacks defined yet.
